options.query:
WITH MaxOrderDate AS (
    SELECT MAX(O_ORDERDATE) AS MaxDate
    FROM ORDERS
)

SELECT
    O_ORDERPRIORITY AS orderPriority,
    COUNT(*) AS orderCount
FROM
    ORDERS
WHERE
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (SELECT MaxDate FROM MaxOrderDate))
GROUP BY
    O_ORDERPRIORITY
ORDER BY
    O_ORDERPRIORITY;

WITH MaxOrderDate AS (
    SELECT MAX(O_ORDERDATE) AS MaxDate
    FROM ORDERS
)

SELECT
    count(DISTINCT O_CLERK) AS totalClerks
FROM
    ORDERS
WHERE
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (SELECT DATEADD(MONTH, -1, MaxDate) FROM MaxOrderDate))
AND
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (SELECT DATEADD(MONTH, -1, MaxDate) FROM MaxOrderDate));

SELECT
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM o_orderdate)+25 AS YEAR,
    COUNT(*) AS order_count
FROM
    ORDERS
GROUP BY
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM o_orderdate)
ORDER BY
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM o_orderdate);

WITH MaxOrderDate AS (
    SELECT MAX(O_ORDERDATE) AS MaxDate
    FROM ORDERS
)

SELECT
    AVG(O_TOTALPRICE) AS avgOrderValue
FROM
    ORDERS
WHERE
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (SELECT DATEADD(MONTH, -1, MaxDate) FROM MaxOrderDate))
AND
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (SELECT DATEADD(MONTH, -1, MaxDate) FROM MaxOrderDate));

WITH MaxOrderDate AS (
    SELECT MAX(O_ORDERDATE) AS MaxDate
    FROM ORDERS
)

SELECT
    COUNT(O_CUSTKEY) AS customerCount
FROM
    ORDERS
WHERE
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (SELECT DATEADD(MONTH, -1, MaxDate) FROM MaxOrderDate))
AND
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (SELECT DATEADD(MONTH, -1, MaxDate) FROM MaxOrderDate));

WITH MaxOrderDate AS (
    SELECT MAX(O_ORDERDATE) AS MaxDate
    FROM ORDERS
)

SELECT
    COUNT(DISTINCT O_CUSTKEY) AS customerCount
FROM
    ORDERS
WHERE
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (SELECT MaxDate FROM MaxOrderDate))
AND
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (SELECT MaxDate FROM MaxOrderDate));

WITH MaxOrderDate AS (
    SELECT MAX(O_ORDERDATE) AS MaxDate
    FROM ORDERS
)

SELECT
    SUM(O_TOTALPRICE) AS totalRevenue
FROM
    ORDERS
WHERE
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (SELECT MaxDate FROM MaxOrderDate))
AND
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (SELECT MaxDate FROM MaxOrderDate));

WITH MaxOrderDate AS (
    SELECT MAX(O_ORDERDATE) AS MaxDate
    FROM ORDERS
)

SELECT
    SUM(O_TOTALPRICE) AS totalRevenue
FROM
    ORDERS
WHERE
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (SELECT DATEADD(MONTH, -1, MaxDate) FROM MaxOrderDate))
AND
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (SELECT DATEADD(MONTH, -1, MaxDate) FROM MaxOrderDate));

WITH MaxOrderDate AS (
    SELECT MAX(O_ORDERDATE) AS MaxDate
    FROM ORDERS
),
MonthlyData AS (
    SELECT
        EXTRACT(MONTH FROM o_orderdate) AS Month,
        COUNT(*) AS NumberOfOrders
    FROM ORDERS
    WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM o_orderdate) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (SELECT MaxDate FROM MaxOrderDate))
    GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM o_orderdate)
    ORDER BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM o_orderdate)
),
AllMonths AS (
    SELECT 1 AS MonthNum, 'Jan' AS MonthName
    UNION ALL SELECT 2, 'Feb'
    UNION ALL SELECT 3, 'Mar'
    UNION ALL SELECT 4, 'Apr'
    UNION ALL SELECT 5, 'May'
    UNION ALL SELECT 6, 'Jun'
    UNION ALL SELECT 7, 'Jul'
    UNION ALL SELECT 8, 'Aug'
    UNION ALL SELECT 9, 'Sep'
    UNION ALL SELECT 10, 'Oct'
    UNION ALL SELECT 11, 'Nov'
    UNION ALL SELECT 12, 'Dec'
)
SELECT
    AllMonths.MonthName,
    COALESCE(MonthlyData.NumberOfOrders, 0) AS TotalOrders
FROM
    AllMonths
LEFT JOIN MonthlyData ON MonthlyData.Month = AllMonths.MonthNum;

SELECT
    O_ORDERSTATUS AS orderStatus,
    COUNT(*) AS orderCount
FROM
    ORDERS
GROUP BY
    O_ORDERSTATUS
ORDER BY
    O_ORDERSTATUS;

WITH MaxOrderDate AS (
    SELECT MAX(O_ORDERDATE) AS MaxDate
    FROM ORDERS
)

SELECT
    count(DISTINCT O_CLERK) AS totalClerks
FROM
    ORDERS
WHERE
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (SELECT MaxDate FROM MaxOrderDate))
AND
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (SELECT MaxDate FROM MaxOrderDate));

WITH MaxOrderDate AS (
    SELECT MAX(O_ORDERDATE) AS MaxDate
    FROM ORDERS
)

SELECT
    AVG(O_TOTALPRICE) AS avgOrderValue
FROM
    ORDERS
WHERE
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (SELECT MaxDate FROM MaxOrderDate))
AND
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM O_ORDERDATE) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (SELECT MaxDate FROM MaxOrderDate));
